Code - Plotting¶

plotting_matplotlib¶

Matplotlib plotting functions

Class: ScanPlotManager¶

class babelscan.plotting_matplotlib.ScanPlotManager(scan)[source]¶
scan.plot = ScanPlotManager(scan)

scan.plot() # plot default axes scan.plot.plot(xaxis, yaxis) # creates figure scan.plot.plotline(xaxis, yaxis) # plots line on current figure scan.plot.image() # create figure and display detector image

Options called from babelscan.Scan:

‘plot_show’: True >> automatically call “plt.show” after plot command

Parameters

scan – babelscan.Scan

Class: MultiScanPlotManager¶

class babelscan.plotting_matplotlib.MultiScanPlotManager(multiscan)[source]¶

ScanPlotManager :param scan: babelscan.Scan
